summary: Tottenham Hotspur, or Spurs, is a famous English football club from North London. They play in the Premier League, the country's top league. The team has a proud history, winning many trophies since its start in 1882. This includes two league titles and several FA Cups. Spurs are known for their white and navy kits and their emblem with a cockerel. They play at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, which opened in 2019. The club has fans worldwide and is worth a lot of money.
title: Tottenham Hotspur F.C.
